pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dataset for climate analysis with data from the Nordic region // Nordklim data set 1.0 The Nordklim dataset is a unique and useful achievement for climate analysis. It includes observations of twelve different climate elements from more than 100 stations in the Nordic region. It covers a time span for more than 100 years. Project contractors: NORDKLIM/NORDMET on behalf of the National meteorological services in Denmark (DMI), Finland (FMI), Iceland (VI), Norway (DNMI) and Sweden (SMHI)
